interactivity.to_get_this_event: Have 10+ Ayane Lust before What's Done is Done . Autoplays after " Reverse Cowgirl " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " What's Done is Done " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Have less than 10 Ayane Lust before chain-event What's Done is Done . Replaced by Back to Normal .

progression.synopsis: As Sensei and Ayane step away to spend some time alone, Kirin overhears and gains some leverage over the two.
trivia: This event has a permanent effect on the relationship between Ayane and Kirin, drastically altering dialogue between the two for the  duration of the game. In addition, missing this event will fail 3 future events!
In addition, missing this event will fail 3 future events!

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.8.
